segments.text: How do you think they could be ended ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think that there is any easy way . The United Nations could send peacekeepers into the country . At least then the warring parties could be forced to negotiate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , if the cause is poverty , there should be a program to make the country richer.If the problem is resources , share them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds easy when you say it like that . In reality , it's harder to make peace between countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is.One way to stop countries fighting is to cut off their financial support . Wars are very expensive .
segments.speaker: S1
